pageContext.claim: “And whether it was a man or a woman, 30 years ago, 36 years ago — in fact, they don't even know how many years ago, because nobody knows what the time is.”
pageContext.analysis: Christine Blasey Ford, who accused Brett Kavanaugh of sexually assaulting her, gave lengthy and detailed testimony to the Senate Judiciary Committee. She specifically said the alleged assault happened in 1982 and named three other people who were at the same gathering. Ford said she didn't remember many details, but Trump is twisting her words with these comments.
